extension.summary: Install Add-ons, Plugins, Games and Programs from [COLOR FF757677]Alex[/COLOR][COLOR FF8ABEE2]ELEC[/COLOR]
extension.description: Download and install Add-ons, Plugins, Games and Programs from [COLOR FF757677]Alex[/COLOR][COLOR FF8ABEE2]ELEC[/COLOR] addon repository.[CR] All addons on this repository have under gone basic testing, if you find a broken or not working addon please report it to [COLOR FF757677]Alex[/COLOR][COLOR FF8ABEE2]ELEC[/COLOR] so we can take any action needed.
